quote: One of the greatest titles in the world is parent, and one of the biggest blessings in the world is to have parents to call mom and dad.
author: Jim DeMint

quote: My father gave me the greatest gift anyone could give another person, he believed in me.
author: Jim Valvano

quote: It is a wise father that knows his own child.
author: William Shakespeare

quote: To a father growing old nothing is dearer than a daughter.
author: Euripides

quote: I decided in my life that I would do nothing that did not reflect positively on my father's life.
author: Sidney Poitier

quote: Anyone can be a father, but it takes someone special to be a dad, and that's why I call you dad, because you are so special to me. You taught me the game and you taught me how to play it right.
author: Wade Boggs

quote: A real man loves his wife, and places his family as the most important thing in life. Nothing has brought me more peace and content in life than simply being a good husband and father.
author: Frank Abagnale

quote: One father is more than a hundred schoolmasters.
author: George Herbert

quote: It doesn't matter who my father was; it matters who I remember he was.
author: Anne Sexton

quote: When a father gives to his son, both laugh; when a son gives to his father, both cry.
author: Unknown

quote: My father used to say that it's never too late to do anything you wanted to do. And he said, 'You never know what you can accomplish until you try.'
author: Michael Jordan

quote: I would say my greatest achievement in life right now - my greatest achievement period is - and I'm still trying to achieve it - is to be a wonderful father to my kids.
author: Bo Jackson

quote: I am not ashamed to say that no man I ever met was my father's equal, and I never loved any other man as much.
author: Hedy Lamarr

quote: Until you have a son of your own... you will never know the joy, the love beyond feeling that resonates in the heart of a father as he looks upon his son.
author: Kent Nerburn

quote: Being a father has been, without a doubt, my greatest source of achievement, pride and inspiration. Fatherhood has taught me about unconditional love, reinforced the importance of giving back and taught me how to be a better person.
author: Naveen Jain

quote: Man becomes man only by his intelligence, but he is man only by his heart.
author: Henri Frederic Amiel

quote: Old as she was, she still missed her daddy sometimes.
author: Gloria Naylor

quote: The most important thing in the world is family and love.
author: John Wooden

quote: Son, brother, father, lover, friend. There is room in the heart for all the affections, as there is room in heaven for all the stars.
author: Victor Hugo

quote: Dad, wherever you are, you are gone but you will never be forgotten.
author: Conrad Hall

quote: My dad's not here, but he's watching in heaven.
author: Bubba Watson

quote: My father always used to say that when you die, if you've got five real friends, then you've had a great life.
author: Lee Iacocca

quote: I think my mom put it best. She said, 'Little girls soften their daddy's hearts.'
author: Paul Walker

quote: Dad taught me everything I know. Unfortunately, he didn't teach me everything he knows.
author: Al Unser

quote: My Dad is my hero.
author: Harry Connick, Jr.

quote: You don't have to deserve your mother's love. You have to deserve your father's.
author: Robert Frost

quote: This is the price you pay for having a great father. You get the wonder, the joy, the tender moments - and you get the tears at the end, too.
author: Harlan Coben

quote: I was raised by my father; I was daddy's girl.
author: Amber Heard

quote: It's an ongoing joy being a dad.
author: Liam Neeson

quote: I admire my father greatly.
author: Kojo Annan

quote: I'm a father; that's what matters most. Nothing matters more.
author: Gordon Brown

quote: We should all aspire in life to do a multitude of things well - to be a great father, to be a good husband, to be a good lover, you know, to try to do things the best you can is very important to me.
author: Matthew Modine

quote: The best thing about being a dad? Well, I think it's just the thing that every man wants - to have a son and heir.
author: George Best

quote: Fatherhood is the best thing that could happen to me, and I'm just glad I can share my voice.
author: Dwyane Wade

quote: I have a Father's Day every day.
author: Dennis Banks

quote: Without my dad, I wouldn't be here.
author: Maria Sharapova

quote: In our house, Mother's Day is every day. Father's Day, too. In our house, parents count. They do important work and that work matters. One day just doesn't cut for us.
author: Margaret Heffernan

quote: I want to congratulate all the men out there who are working diligently to be good fathers whether they are stepfathers, or biological fathers or just spiritual fathers.
author: T. D. Jakes

quote: My role model is my dad.
author: Seann William Scott

quote: My dad is my best friend, my father, and my boss. When I do something that is exciting and he likes it, it feels three times as good as you can imagine.
author: David Lauren

quote: Becoming a dad means you have to be a role model for your son and be someone he can look up to.
author: Wayne Rooney

quote: To be as good as our fathers we must be better, imitation is not discipleship.
author: Wendell Phillips

quote: One of the greatest gifts my father gave me - unintentionally - was witnessing the courage with which he bore adversity. We had a bit of a rollercoaster life with some really challenging financial periods. He was always unshaken, completely tranquil, the same ebullient, laughing, jovial man.
author: Ben Okri

quote: My dad was my best friend and greatest role model. He was an amazing dad, coach, mentor, soldier, husband and friend.
author: Tiger Woods

quote: We looked up to our father. He still is much greater than us.
author: Wynton Marsalis

quote: Being a father helps me be more responsible... you see more things than you've ever seen.
author: Kid Rock

quote: I mean, I look at my dad. He was twenty when he started having a family, and he was always the coolest dad. He did everything for his kids, and he never made us feel like he was pressured. I know that it must be a great feeling to be a guy like that.
author: Adam Sandler

quote: I was raised in the greatest of homes... just a really great dad, and I miss him so much... he was a good man, a real simple man... Very faithful, always loved my mom, always provided for the kids, and just a lot of fun.
author: Max Lucado

quote: I can definitely say the older I've got the better I've become at being a dad and a husband.
author: Rod Stewart

quote: I imagine God to be like my father. My father was always the voice of certainty in my life. Certainty in the wisdom, certainty in the path, certainty always in God. For me God is certainty in everything. Certainty that everything is good and everything is God.
author: Yehuda Berg

quote: I'm always going to love my father.
author: Floyd Mayweather, Jr.

quote: I wasn't anything special as a father. But I loved them and they knew it.
author: Sammy Davis, Jr.

quote: Mothers play an important role as the heart of the home, but this in no way lessens the equally important role fathers should play, as head of the home, in nurturing, training, and loving their children.
author: Ezra Taft Benson

quote: I've said it before, but it's absolutely true: My mother gave me my drive, but my father gave me my dreams. Thanks to him, I could see a future.
author: Liza Minnelli

quote: I pray to be a good servant to God, a father, a husband, a son, a friend, a brother, an uncle, a good neighbor, a good leader to those who look up to me, a good follower to those who are serving God and doing the right thing.
author: Mark Wahlberg

quote: My dad's my best mate, and he always will be.
author: Cher Lloyd

quote: I had no expectations about fatherhood, really, but it's definitely a journey I'm glad to be taking. Number one, it's a great learning experience. When my mother told me it's a 24/7 job, she wasn't kidding.
author: Christopher Meloni

quote: I would want my legacy to be that I was a great son, father and friend.
author: Dante Hall

quote: When it comes to Father's Day, I will remember my dad for both being there to nurture me and also for the times he gave me on my own to cultivate my own interests and to nurture my own spirit.
author: Jennifer Grant

quote: I would love to be a father. I had a great father who taught me how gratifying that is. I'm not going to deny myself that. I think I'd be good at it. Everybody wants that experience. I definitely do.
author: Mike Myers
